bookTitle: Avatar: The Last Airbender: The Promise, Part 1
bookAuthors: Gene Luen Yang, Bryan Konietzko, Michael Dante DiMartino, Gurihiru
Plot: The war is over...but the adventure has just begun! Picking up exactly where Avatar: The Last Airbender left off. The Promise takes Aang to a Fire Nation colony in the heart of the Earth Nation, where tensions between neighbors threaten to shatter the world's newfound peace--putting the Avatar on a collision course with one of his closest friends, Fire Lord Zuko!
